name: Squares (itch) (Adil Dev)
description:
This game is a simple 2d shooter game where you have to avoid the red squares by destroying them and earn points by destroying and protecting your base.

Controls/How To Play

A and D to left and right, Space to shoot.

Control your character by these keys and protect your base. If the enemy collides with the ground beneath character you will lose 5 points and by destroying each red square you get 1 point. Keep doing this and beat your own score.

Made in 1 hour

This game is made in 1 hour so that's why this is crappy. But will improve later.

Thanks for visiting or playing this game!
